text: If this relates to CSS files then check for errors in the CSS. HubSpot will not minify CSS files if it encounters erorrs in the code

what are the files that are causing the issue? can you provide a link?
line 4215 of your main.css there is an extra curly bracket. Remove this and that file should then get minified
